name: Genesis Simple Breadcrumbs
author: Nick_theGeek

sections.description:
Genesis Simple Breadcrumbs adds a new menu item to the Genesis menu allowing for easy changes to the Genesis Breadcrumbs including:

  • Home text
  • Breadcrumb separator
  • List Separator
  • Breadcrumb Wrap (prefix)
  • Breadcrumb Wrap (suffix)
  • Default Labels
  • and more

This plugin requires the Genesis Theme Framework

Special Thanks

I owe a huge debt of gratitude to all the folks at StudioPress, their themes make my life easier.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire genesis-simple-breadcrumbs folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Simple Breadcrumbs menu item under Genesis
  4. Select desired breadcrumbs options and save settings
sections.changelog:
1.0 (1-23-2012 : Current)

  • Added Class check to prevent errors when Genesis 1.8+ is not installed.
  • This version still requires Genesis 1.8+

1.0 (1-20-2012)

  • Added new admin builder class. This allows for a simple interface and reduced code if used with other plugins using this class.
  • Added support for Genesis 1.8

0.3 (9-16-2011)

  • Revised to add translation support for localization
  • Updated for WP 3.2+ buttons

0.2 (5-28-2011)

  • First Public Release

short_description: Genesis Menu options with custom menu, categories, pages, and primary/secondary nav extras.
